revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=airRouter |revision=HP (AR-HP) |upc=609132712685 |ean= |asin=B007ZJ8KLA |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/17/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=SWX-ARHP |ic_id=6545A-ARHP |us_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7241;AR7241-AH1A, H05268.1C, 1119, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=25P64V6P |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AA160TSA-5G |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=looks like it,, J3 |serial=yes,, internal,, 12-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, JP3 |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9285;AR9285-AL1A, D1U470C, 1121, KOREA; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Anadigics;AWL6153;AWL6153, 1126 9785AE, 027 PH;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt,DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=www.ubnt.com |default_ssid_regex=^www.ubnt.com$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui=00:27:22, 24:A4:3C |oui_eth=00:27:22, 24:A4:3C }} {{ProductPage|http://www.ubnt.com/airrouter}}
[http://dl.ubnt.com/datasheets/airrouter/AirRouter_Datasheet.pdf ''AirRouter'' Datasheet]
The ''Ubiquiti Networks'' logo, "AIR-ROUTER HP", and "Made in China" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"11-00228-03" and "UBIQUITI NETWORKS (C) 2011" is also etched onto the board. :Production models seem to bear the same text.
==Additional external links== ===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/ubiquiti/airrouter ''AirRouter/AirRouter-HP'' on the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ===Vendors=== *[http://store.netgate.com/Ubiquiti-AirRouter-HP-80211n-Indoor-Wireless-Router-P1797.aspx On '''Netgate''']
